leadText.title: Placement of products in the online store catalog
leadText.description: Create your price list for potential customers in 1 click

crumbs.text: Placement of products in the online store catalog

bannerText.title: Online store is a platform for small and urgent purchases of goods and services up to 20 million rubles.
text:
Here the supplier receives orders in two ways:
1. Directly, through an express order formed based on the price list
2. The supplier independently submits price offers, participating in the price requests of customers

text.title: To receive direct orders, the supplier adds a price list to the database with a range of products that can be found by customers. This method helps to avoid the second method, i.e. the need to monitor each procurement constantly.

wrapper.name: Use a simple and transparent way to work with an online store

head.text: Get direct access to the orders of the largest companies

items.text: TEK-Torg works with such corporations as Rosneft, Gazprom, Spimex and many others. Among the organizers of the procurement there are more than a hundred domestic corporations and their subsidiaries. There are really a lot of orders for you here!
СReduce labor costs for creating a price list TEK-Torg will help to present goods in the price list for the customer faster than others - 200 rubles per position

sideCard.title: How to place an item in an online store

cards.title: Add items manually specifying their characteristics
cards.text: It is free of charge, but time-consuming procedure that involves entering a lot of data for each position manually

cards.title: Order assistance in the placement of products/services
cards.text: Just 1 click and your price list will be posted by TEK-Torg employees shortly
